title: Electronic piano

claims.preamble: The ornamental design for an electronic piano, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of the top, front and left side of an electronic piano showing our new design;
FIG. 2 is a front elevational view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a left side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a right side elevational view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a top plan view thereof;
FIG. 7 is a bottom plan view thereof; and,
FIG. 8 is a perspective view thereof with the keyboard cover closed.
